entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
